After the three days of not controling his ship,the earth was 
alligned in direction Pegatron's ship would crash on it.

Pegatron:Saved! Tank you shadow spirit! I will fight not only to 
proove my strengh but I will fight for your honor too.

Just before he entered the earth atmosphere he puts the shield at 
100% for his safety.(What else...)The ship looked like a shooting 
star during the day.He was passing at one kilometer of the sea and 
crashed on the land.The pilots gets out after some time to relax.

Pegatron:Damn that was close.I've almost died in this one...

Right after he start his journey to find any opponents and proove 
himself.
